description: Schema for extracting plant-pollinator interaction data from scientific literature

organisms_identifiable.description: Whether both plant and pollinator can be identified to species level ('true' or 'false')

plant_species_scientific_name.description: Scientific name of the plant species

plant_species_common_name.description: Common name of the plant species

pollinator_species_scientific_name.description: Scientific name of the pollinator species

pollinator_species_common_name.description: Common name of the pollinator species

pollinator_type.description: Type of pollinator (e.g., bee, butterfly, hummingbird, moth, beetle, fly, bat, wind)

observation_start_date.description: Start date of observation period (YYYY-MM-DD format)

observation_end_date.description: End date of observation period (YYYY-MM-DD format)

location.description: Geographic location where pollination was observed

all_supporting_source_sentences.description: Array of verbatim sentences from the document that support this pollination record

page_number.description: Page number where this information appears
